Translations.Text: You who believe, your possessions and your children should not distract you from God's remembrance. And anyone who does that, then they are the losers

And spend (in God's way) from what We provided you before death comes to one of you and he says: my Master, why did You not postpone me (my death) for a short period, so that I give to charity and be of the righteous
And God will never postpone (the death of) anyone when his time comes. God is well informed of what you do
